channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD

item.title: Report X-2024030845
item.description:
Report X-2024030845

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-26T15:10:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-12
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE WAS PICKED UP ON UNLOAD WET AND DAMAGED DescribePack: UPON INSPECTION FOUND 1 OUT OF 4 BOTTLES WITH A BROKEN SEAL AND LOOSE CAP WHICH ALLOWED THE PRODUCT TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: RED TOTE

item.title: Report X-2024030823
item.description:
Report X-2024030823

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-12
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING DURING SORTATION. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME LOOSE ON THE PLASTIC POUCH CAUSING THE CONTENTS TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024030931
item.description:
Report X-2024030931

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-22T18:13:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-15
  • City: BELTSVILLE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I found the ripped, torn and wet package in the damage hazmat cage. I repackaged the damage in a salvage drum and filled out the required reports. DescribePack: One of the four bottles in box had a loose cap. About 1 quart of content leaked out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The wet package was placed in a tub and taken to the damage hazmat cage.
